title: Mine on Channel Reef
creator_credit: Australia. Dept. of Defence and Vincent Donovan
brief_description: Two divers swimming near Channel Reef, a coral reef off the coast of Cairns in Queensland, come across a live mine. The Royal Australian Navy locate and dispose of the mine.
